toolName.zh: 英文文本詞彙統計工具

stopwordsCopyright.zh: 預設停用詞清單取自：自然語言處理 python 套件 NLTK。
stopwordsCopyright.en: Default stopwords are from NLTK (Python package of Natural Language Processing).

widgetNotReady.zh: Widget 尚未準備好，請稍等。
widgetNotReady.en: Widget is not ready, please wait.

setTag.en: Please choolse at least one tag.

paraError.zh: 無法抓取分析參數，請洽工程師。
paraError.en: Cannot get the parameters of analysis, please contact the engineer.

csvStrError.zh: 無法產生統計結果 csv，請洽工程師。
csvStrError.en: Cannot generate csv string of analysis results, please contact the engineer.

backendError.zh: 後端處理錯誤，請提供文本與錯誤出現的操作過程予工程師偵錯。
backendError.en: Error in backend processing, please provide corpus and procedure of how the error appears for engineer to debug.

modeIDError.zh: 分析模式 id 錯誤，請洽工程師。
modeIDError.en: Error in ID of analysis mode, please contact the engineer.

docRangeErrorDash.zh: 非單件宣告需有「-」符號，且「-」前數字為正整數，此項將忽略。
docRangeErrorDash.en: Use '-' to define multiple documents in document range setting, and the number before '-' needs to be postive integer. This item will be ignored.

docRangeErrorNum.zh: 「-」前數字需比「-」後數字小，此項將忽略。
docRangeErrorNum.en: The number before '-' needs to be smaller than the number after '-'. This item will be ignored.
